comments.author: Matt
comments.body: That cute puppy is still alive and doing quite well unlike the gentleman in that picture who hasn't aged quite as gracefully. As luck may have it the birthday boy may end up with a checkride and subsequent solo flight in the mighty T-34C on his birthday. Fancy that!

comments.body: Since I am generally a wuss, I think the wind is a bit much tomorrow. Let's shoot for a nicer day. Dennis

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Is that young Master Burton? A deceptively genteel photo, given what we know today, eh? Experts tell us that this is the last known photo of MB wearing clean socks. It was only a month or so after this picture was taken that MB slipped into what is now known as his "trog period." It would be years before he resurfaced, and though the historical record points toward a "den" somewhere under Interstate 40 in Indiana, MB's whereabouts during that period remain deeply shrouded in mystery. In 2005, his overnight apotheosis and subsequent meltdown at the hands of a vastly superior Dave Underwood became the stuff of Frenzy legend. The puppy went on to become a dog. DU
